title.narrative: Outer Island Renewable Energy Project - Additional Financing

description.narrative: The proposed additional financing will support the scaling up of the current project by upgrading the existing power distribution grid in the islands of Vava'u and 'Eua, which will result in additional savings of about 0.12 million liters of diesel per year.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
Reports and Recommendations of the President

By the end of 2019: Output 1: Original Project: Construct and install 1.32 MWp solar system (output indicators (i)-(iii) on nine outer islands Additional Financing: Rehabilitation of 100% of the existing grid system on 'Eua and 50% on Vava'u.
